document.full_text: the defense attorney for former illinois governor rod blagojevich was criticized by a federal judge on monday for "non-factual descriptions" and arguments deemed inadmissible in questioning witnesses.
document.title: blagojevich defense attorney admonished by judge
lines_and_colors: the defense attorney for former illinois governor rod blagojevich was criticized by a federal judge on monday for "non-factual descriptions" and arguments deemed inadmissible in questioning witnesses.
